1.0.0.name: wordpress/gallandbe-wp-tools
1.0.0.description:
Via this plug-in we share the Wordpress tools developed by Galland.be.

Overview

These modules will help you to effectively use Wordpress as a CMS for your company. SPAM fighter,..

SPAM fighter, Protect your website from comment SPAM

  • Free and no license key
  • No CAPTCHA
  • No additonal database load
  • Your data is not shared with other servers.
